message.comment: Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (USA).
Second Half begins Ghana 0, USA 1.
Substitution, USA. John Anthony Brooks replaces Matt Besler because of an injury.
First Half ends, Ghana 0, USA 1.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Ayew (Ghana) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Christian Atsu.
Corner, Ghana. Conceded by DaMarcus Beasley.
Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Corner, USA. Conceded by Adam Larsen Kwarasey.
Foul by Daniel Opare (Ghana).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Aron Jóhannsson (USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Daniel Opare (Ghana) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Attempt missed. Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Christian Atsu with a cross.
André Ayew (Ghana) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Clint Dempsey (USA) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by André Ayew.
Offside, Ghana. Mohammed Rabiu tries a through ball, but Jordan Ayew is caught offside.
Mohammed Rabiu (Ghana) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Mohammed Rabiu (Ghana).
Kyle Beckerman (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Christian Atsu (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kwadwo Asamoah.
Attempt blocked. Christian Atsu (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordan Ayew.
Christian Atsu (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Corner, Ghana. Conceded by Matt Besler.
Attempt missed. Alejandro Bedoya (USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Clint Dempsey.
Foul by Jordan Ayew (Ghana).
Kyle Beckerman (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. John Boye (Ghana) header from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sulley Ali Muntari with a cross following a corner.
Corner, Ghana. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, USA. Aron Jóhannsson replaces Jozy Altidore because of an injury.
Delay in match Jozy Altidore (USA) because of an injury.
Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).
Attempt blocked. Jozy Altidore (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Fabian Johnson with a cross.
Foul by Jordan Ayew (Ghana).
Matt Besler (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, USA. Jermaine Jones tries a through ball, but Clint Dempsey is caught offside.
Offside, Ghana. André Ayew tries a through ball, but Christian Atsu is caught offside.
Offside, Ghana. Sulley Ali Muntari tries a through ball, but Asamoah Gyan is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Jozy Altidore (USA) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Alejandro Bedoya with a cross.
André Ayew (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Daniel Opare (Ghana) because of an injury.
Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by DaMarcus Beasley (USA).
Goal! Ghana 0, USA 1. Clint Dempsey (USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jermaine Jones.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
